content: विहन् {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To kill, slay, destroy, destroy completely, annihilate; (अलं) सहसा संहतिमंहसां विहंतुं <ls>Ki. 5. 17</ls>, <ls n="Ki.">14. 23.</ls> {@--2@} To strike, beat violently. {@--3@} To obstruct, impede, oppose, resist; विघ्नांति रक्षांसि वने क्रतूंश्च <ls>Bk. 1. 19</ls>; <ls>Śi. 14. 8</ls>, <ls>R. 5. 27.</ls> {@--4@} To reject, refuse, decline; तद्भूतनाथानुग नार्हसि त्वं संबंधिनो मे प्रणयं विहंतुं <ls>R. 2. 58</ls>; न व्यहन्यत कदाचिदर्थिता <ls n="R.">11. 2.</ls> {@--5@} To disappoint, foil, frustrate. {@--6@} To separate.
